title: Big Bill: the story of a heron
creator_credit: Hugh Miles, Anthony Bomford and RSPB Film and Video Unit
brief_description: This beautifully photographed film looks at one of the most well-known water-birds, the grey heron. Habitat, nesting, breeding, raising the young and collecting food are aspects of the heron’s life that are examined. Narrated by Eric Thompson.
